kpi.name: M8001C422

kpi_info.title: Number of initial PDCCH order attempts
kpi_info.use: This counter provides the number of initial PDCCH order attempts. UPDATED: Transmission of an initial PDCCH order (eNB -> UE; 3GPP TS 36.321, TS 36.212) to initiate a UE Random Access; that is this counter is updated when the first (initial) PDCCH order is transmitted to a UE; this counter is not updated with PDCCH transmission repetitions.

kpi.kpi_alias: Number of initial PDCCH order attempts
